name: Dragabox
description:
GET THESE BOXES OUT OF THE WAY!

Use your intellect to navigate your way through over 200 puzzling levels.

You might think you have played some games that require pushing things around, but this game requires a lot of pulling!

Do you have what it takes to reach the door? You must first clear a path by moving boxes that stand in your way. There are combinations of pull boxes, push boxes, and electric barriers that need to be deactivated to create a path to success.

Dragabox is an addictive game as you are drawn into apparently simple mazes only to occasionally find yourself cornered. The levels are increasingly tricky, adding different types of obstacles and problems, leading to a natural learning curve of problem-solving. This game will sharpen your intellect!

This game is friendly for all ages and is great for logic training and problem-solving.

Features:

- 12 fun animated avatars you won't find anywhere else
- 225 levels
- undo last play button
- reset level button
- 15 original musical arrangements
- step counter
- stars for personal best scores

Give it a try. See if you can complete all 225 challenges.
